text: hindu log ache log hote hai
bhai yeh sab galat baatein hai
iska religion galat hai isliye ye problem hai
hum sab ek hain desh prem se judenge
muslim log hamesha violence karte hain
desh ka samman karte hain ye log
mera dost mujhe achha lagta hai
main ye kaam karna pasand karta hun
gali kyu dete ho logon ko
acha khana bahut achha lagta hai
sab galat hai is desh mein
ye log sach bol rahe hain
main achhe logon se pyaar karta hun
sab log milke achha kaam karte hain
kutte log hamesha galat karte hain
meri family mujhe achha lagti hai
main achhe khane ka pasand karta hun
tum sab ko hate karta hun
mera school mujhe achha lagta hai
har koi galat baat karta hai
mera ghar mujhe achha lagta hai
mera kaam mujhe achha lagta hai
meri family mujhe achha lagti hai
main achhe khel khelna pasand karta hun
main achhe kapde pehnna pasand karta hun
main achhe khana banana pasand karta hun
mera school mujhe achha lagta hai
main achhe dost banana pasand karta hun
